name: gallery-for-immich
description: WordPress plugin to display Immich galleries

scripts.i18n:update: msgmerge --update --backup=none languages/gallery-for-immich-nl_NL.po languages/gallery-for-immich.pot && msgmerge --update --backup=none languages/gallery-for-immich-de_DE.po languages/gallery-for-immich.pot && msgmerge --update --backup=none languages/gallery-for-immich-fr_FR.po languages/gallery-for-immich.pot
scripts.i18n:mo: msgfmt -o languages/gallery-for-immich-nl_NL.mo languages/gallery-for-immich-nl_NL.po && msgfmt -o languages/gallery-for-immich-de_DE.mo languages/gallery-for-immich-de_DE.po && msgfmt -o languages/gallery-for-immich-fr_FR.mo languages/gallery-for-immich-fr_FR.po
scripts.i18n:build: npm run i18n:mo && npm run i18n:json
scripts.translate: npm run i18n:pot && npm run i18n:update && npm run i18n:build && node scripts/sync-translations.js
